file_content.text: You did it! You really did it!
Let me know how it feels when you go through--I want to document everything!
Hey there! Thanks to all of your hard work, I've got some really great news!
We managed to get out in the field and pinpoint one of the instantaneous travel devices! It's in an old vault, very close by.
A scouting party already went through to confirm the destination. It's the devices' control hub, for sure--and the Esh-kha are in control.
I'll drive the Esh-kha out of there right away.
Not for long.
After everything you've done here, I don't doubt it!
Nothing to worry about.
That isn't exactly great news.
Well, no, not the last part. But at least we've found a way in!
You'll have to do a lot of fighting to drive the Esh-kha out. Be careful.
I wish I could try it--going through. Is it like inertia, moving really fast, or do you just blink and you're there? Does it hurt?
It would probably be a good idea to have a technical specialist along.
Come and find out.
Oh, no, I'm no good in dangerous situations. But maybe I'll get a chance when you've finished!
Why don't I describe it to you over dinner?
[Flirt] I'll gladly tell you.
Oh, no, I don't think you should eat afterward until you've had a full-body scan. What if something got shifted around?
With all the Esh-kha on the other end, you're better off here.
Be glad you don't have to go.
I know, I know. Maybe when you're done, it'll be safe enough for me to give it a try!
I'll just be leaving now....
I'll just be leaving now....
Sorry, sorry. Sidetracked again. Sending the coordinates now. Once you travel through the device, talk to Captain Devlin, the scouting party commander.
Devlin will feed me data so I can pinpoint exactly where the Esh-kha are tapped into the controls, and then you'll knock them out of there.
I'll check in with Devlin as soon as I'm on the other side.
Got it.
I'm looking forward to this.
Devlin and his team aren't going to help me fight at all?
No real backup?
I'm sorry--we need Devlin's team to hold the other device exit and help us locate the real objective. We just don't have any other troops to spare.
Good luck!
Good luck!
Agent Poz? I was told to speak to you.
It's you! I knew it, just as soon as I saw you. This is such a pleasure!
Matter transmission has always been fascinating to me. But then, these devices might not be transmitting matter at all!
Maybe they just replicate the matter instead. Maybe they're fixed dimensional pathways, and the matter doesn't change at all! There are just so many possibilities!
Is there some way we could stop them from working?
Can they be shut down?
Oh, no, not from here. Not without destroying them, anyway, and we can't be sure we'd find them all. And what a waste!
I take it you've been studying these ancient devices?
You clearly know a great deal.
Oh, not in person--if only. They're all in high-danger areas. I wouldn't last a minute out there.
I'm afraid this isn't the kind of stuff they cover at SpecForce academy.
Science isn't my specialty.
Oh, you don't know what you're missing!
Right. Replicating dimensions and so forth. Of course.
Uh... yeah.
No, no, replicating matter! You can't replicate whole dimensions... but, if you could....
It's incredible that such old technology could be so advanced.
I couldn't agree more.
I know! That's the most interesting part of all! This technology is millennia old, older than the Republic itself. It boggles the mind!
Anyway, we need to find one of the... well, "teleporter" might not be accurate, since it might not really be teleporting anything.
Forget the science chat.
Forget the science chat.
Sorry, sorry. I don't mean to get so excited, it's just... nevermind.
We're looking for a... well, "teleporter" may not be the right word. Like I said, we don't really know if actual teleportation is involved.
"Instantaneous Travel Device." There. We're looking for one that the Esh-kha are using, so you can get to the hub where they're controlling the... devices, and stop them.
What can I do to help the search?
How can I help?
Well, the searching part is easy, at least, the technical part of the searching part.
I understand.
The devices put off a special energy signature that we can track. We have all the equipment for the job, ready for the field.
So what do you need me for?
I wish we could--we have the equipment to do it and everything!
But this area is completely out of control. We can't pinpoint the nearest device until you make sure it's safe enough for us to do our work.
I'll make sure the coast is clear so you can begin the search.
I'll get started right away.
This will be trifling.
I do all of the work, then you push a few buttons. Great.
Why did I agree to this?
I'm sorry--I wish we could do more!
Talk to any of the other personnel here--they'll give you a good idea of what needs doing.
Good luck!
Hello!
